rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2932}

unitName: Recovery of function and rehabilitation after brain injury
description: Students will develop an understanding of strategies used to manage neuropsychologically impaired individuals and will learn how to assess the efficacy of techniques used to rehabilitation and management. Participants will receive information from other allied health professional, rehabilitative approaches used by these professions and discuss how a multidisciplinary approach can be used to provide substantial benefits to the brain-injured individual.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
